alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 5:26PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Livingston and southwestern Tangipahoa Parishes through 600 PM CDT... At 526 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Springfield, or 10 miles southwest of Hammond. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hammond, Livingston, Albany, Springfield and Killian. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 12 between mile markers 22 and 37. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 19 and 21. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Tangipahoa; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston
